subject: Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings
Football
lead_paragraph: The rookie running back Michael Cox learned how to deal with adversity after watching his father, a police officer, endure a brutal beating at the hands of fellow officers in 1995.
snippet: The rookie running back Michael Cox learned how to deal with adversity after watching his father, a police officer, endure a brutal beating at the hands of fellow officers in 1995.
